transcript: a lifetime friend has three common traits and they're very rare So if you find someone like this they are a gift in your life the first is is this person someone that when I have bad news I can call them will They Mourn with me rather than being secretly happy that I failed second is when I have good news can I call this person and they will genuinely be happy for me and celebrate with me the third and the least likely to find is someone who can do both of the first two and do so without immediately trying to relate your story and your circumstance to themselves if you can find someone who can do all three you found a rare gift
